task.title: Choosing investigation site
task.shortdesc: Choosing a place or person to investigate is an important task for paranormal investigation. Limited resources mean investigators must choose their site carefully.

taskbody.context: Every site of an investigation is different and each investigator will have their own preferences.

step.cmd: Research the history of prospective locations including accounts previous hauntings and investigations
List narratives and people of interest
Contact the site or person to introduce provided services and estimate date and time of investigation
Confirm logistical details and supply lists
